skillTree.name: Ashtari
skillTree.description: Caradryan normally fights at the head of the Phoenix Guard, as befits his rank, but sometimes conducts the battle from the back of Ashtari, oldest and wisest of the Phoenixes of the Flamespyre.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Asuryan
skillTree.description: Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.

skillTree.name: Caradryan's Gaze
skillTree.description: Caradryan stands atop the walls of the Shrine, his keen gaze scouring the lands of Ulthuan. Indeed, it is said that no event is so small as to evade Caradryan's gaze, and no sound small enough to escape his hearing.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Enhanced Senses
skillTree.description: Some have accused Caradryan of harnessing the prophecies of Asuryan in order to influence the future. However the truth of the matter is that he simply notices things that others do not, and has no prattling tongue to distract him from matters of greater import.

effects.description: Influence cost: -10% for Intrigue at Court actions

Hero action cost: -15%
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.name: Will of Asuryan
skillTree.description: Over his long years of study and contemplation, Caradryan has become ever closer to the thoughts of Asuryan, until finally the hand of the Creator marked him as the Captain of the Phoenix Guard.

skillTree.name: Devoted Guardians
skillTree.description: Caradryan leads the devoted guardians of Asuryan during times of peace and war. There is divine strength in his hand and the wisdom of Asuryan sits upon his noble brow.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for Phoenix Guard units
	(all units in army)

Passive ability: "Guardian" for Phoenix Guard units
	(all units in army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Phoenix Guard units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Natural Bond
skillTree.description: There is a natural bond between the Phoenix Guard and the Phoenixes of Ulthuan. This is a truly fearsome combination, the clear headed judgement of the Phoenix knight directing the Phoenixes attacks to where they can cause the most damage.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Magical Harmony" for Phoenix units
	(replaces: "Attuned to Magic")
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +6 for Phoenix units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +6 for Phoenix units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Captain of the Phoenix Guard
skillTree.description: Caradryan serves the purpose and the plan of the Lord of the Gods, taking orders from no wordly master and appearing on the battlefield only by the will of Asuryan.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Flames of Asuryan" (when on foot)
Passive ability: "Aura of the Frozen Heart" (when mounted on Ashtari only)

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Captain of the Phoenix Guard
backgroundSkills.description: Caradryan is the present day Captain of the Phoenix Guard, and wielder of the Phoenix Blade.

effects.description:
Enables "Numbing Coldness" attacks for Frostheart Phoenix
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +10 for Phoenix Guard and Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

Recruitment cost: -15% for Phoenix Guard and Phoenix units
	(Hero's army)

items.name: The Phoenix Blade
items.description: This ancient flame-wreathed weapon was enchanted for Kor-Baelon, the first Captain of the Phoenix Guard.
